A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a social experiment meant to reform acting norms by installing stronger females and removing male influence. Femininity is being \"force\" fed to us because weak individuals and groups believe masculinity is wrong. Look at how Poe was treated\, look at Fins story arc etc. There are many examples of this. The new director has created this and we should all be wondering why. I reject this movie wholeheartedly and I now know why Harrison Ford wanted to get out of this sordid affair.
